body:
Hi Randolph,


Francesco Anselmo wrote a python script several years ago (rad2obj)  
that will convert RAD geometry to OBJ:
http://www.bozzograo.net/radiance/pub/rad2obj.py


Hope this helps.


Chris
Christian Humann ~ Associate
